projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: These is a complete demonstration of my profile using react and framer motion for animation where i have tried to reflect my projects as well as my MERN development skills. I have putted the projects with live links. my experience and the services i provide are being shown there. The website is fully responsive.

projects.title: Marvel_Verse
projects.description: These is the landing page for marvel movies hub. where the movies are fetched from an self made api using props and states. These is again a fully responsive website.

projects.title: Calculator Using Reactjs
projects.description: These webpage is a calculator which use eval function to do calculations. I have used useState hook for getting and setting result and the input string all cases are handled so well. You can write a long mathematical numerical expression and with a single click on '=' it gets evaluated All errors are taken care of

projects.title: Coffee shop
projects.description: This is just a simple frontend website which is a landing page of a coffee shop website made using HTML, CSS, JS

projects.title: MotorBike Shop
projects.description: This is just a simple frontend website which is a landing page of a Motorcycle shop with a Login and Signup form integrated in it website made using HTML, CSS, JS
